title: SLPPs Nipuna Ranawaka confronted by angry locals in South of Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna Parliamentarian was confronted by angry locals when he was visiting Urubokka, a small town in the southern part of Sri Lanka.
The MP was jeered off by the locals following a brief exchange of words.
SLPPs Nipuna Ranawaka confronted by angry locals in South of Sri Lanka
Ship carrying 750 tonnes of diesel sinks off Tunisia’s coast
